lines: - 1.7.0_55 or higher (For instructions on setting up the JDK on different + 1.6.0_23 or higher - recommended JDK 1.7.x, untested on JDK 1.8.x (For instructions on setting up the JDK on different operating systems, visit Java homepage.

Linux, Solaris, macOS, MS Windows - XP/2003/2008 (Not fully tested on Windows Vista/7/8/10). Since Apache Synapse is a Java application, it will generally be possible to run it on other operating systems with a - JDK 1.7.x runtime. Linux is recommended for production + JDK 1.6.x or higher runtime. Linux is recommended for production deployments.
